body:
It's a bit of a hack, but the current standard test for CPU RAM is here:
https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/master/tensorflow/core/distributed_runtime/rpc/grpc_worker_service.cc#L347
Of course, it requires the device ptr.
